1.content:
Welcome to the Beginning of Time, with Gaspar's lesser-known younger brother, Bastar! From here, it is possible to alter the flow of time, and create infinitely possible new timelines.

But you have one thing in particular in mind, don't you? Very well, first select who's history we will be taking off course...
1.title: The Beginning of Time

11.content:
Princess Nadia, the tomboyish princess of Guardia, who accompanies Crono under the false name Marle.

How does Marle gain weight?
11.title: Marle

12.content:
Corn's childhood friend, Lucca. A prodigy inventor who created the gate key and fixes Robo on a regular basis.

How does Lucca gain weight?
12.title: Lucca

choices: She's always been large and in charge
13.content:
Ayla is the energetic leader of the Ioka tribe. A prehistoric powerhouse with some implied bisexuality...

How is Ayla going to gain?
13.title: Ayla

14.content: What other options do you want to explore?
14.title: Someone Else

info.brief_description: The girls from the classic game Chrono Trigger are gaining weight, and you decide how!
info.description:
Chrono Trigger is an old classic SNES jrpg that still holds up to this day! But will the metabolisms of it's leading ladies hold up as well? Almost certainly not!

Ground rules:

1.Weight gain and related fetishes only; Light slob is allowed but nothing beyond sweating/burping

2.No character death, gore, underage characters, or anything else similarly extreme

3.Make sure that new entries are at least a paragraph or two in length unless simply supplying an option. People are here to read stories, so make sure you're adding substantial content

4.On a related note, keep your grammar clean and try to limit the amount of dirty language

5.Nothing explicitly pornographic. Romance is fine, but nothing excessively erotic
